info.description: Check Point Logic Apps Custom Connector, based on Check Point Management API v1.6

post.description: Shows a service group with its matched content displayed as ranges of port numbers, and not as Check Point Objects.

Remove an override from an existing profile for a specific protection. Profiles that are mentioned in the command will return to their default values.
In the example below, the override for "New Profile 1" is removed and returns to its default value.

default.script-name: Script Example: List files under / dir

post.description: Update the objects in the Updatable Objects repository. Use the show-task command to check the progress of the task.
Continue an existing API session who's UID is "bae159e7-d3ef-44ab-a8a8-ea3ce7ee25a5" in SmartConsole.
Request for changes by start session and end session. Use the show-task command to check the progress of the task. Output below is the output of the show-task command.
Verify the Management Database can revert to the selected revision.
Shows the entire Threat Rules Rulebase.
Create a group with single member
Log out from the existing session
Shows the Access Rule with its members displayed as ranges, and not as Check Point Objects.

post.summary: add-access-rule to the top of the rulebase
post.description: add-access-rule to the top of the rulebase
Show updatable object using it's name
Add two hosts and two address ranges

default.description: Session to work on ticket number CR00323665

post.description: Show objects of the Updatable Objects Repository with "Amazon" in their name
Revert the Management Database to the selected revision.
Shows the first 50 service groups with each service group's matched content displayed as ranges of port numbers, and not as Check Point Objects.
Set exception group with an apply-on
Publish the last changes. Use the show-task command to check the progress of the task.
Show all successful tasks initiated by administrator admin1, last updated after date 2018-05-23T08:00:00.
Searches for direct usage of target object in other objects and rules
Set two hosts and two address ranges
show threat exception rulebase of a threat rule
Show all the commands supported by the API server
Shows the entire NAT Rules Rulebase.
Purge all sessions except the specified number of newest sessions to preserve.
Delete two hosts and two address ranges
Login request to receive session token.
Show all the sessions. Details level: UID
Take over an existing session with UID "41e821a0-3720-11e3-aa6e-0800200c9fde".

default.comments: rule for RND members  RNDNetwork-> RND to Internal Network

post.description: Showing a list of threat indicators
Assign an existing session with UID "41e821a0-3720-11e3-aa6e-0800200c9fde" to current administrator.
Shows all the imported updatable objects

prerequisites: You need to first deploy the Check Point Connector in your subscription before you can install this playbook.

metadata.description: Gain insights into Check Point network activities, including number of gateways and servers, security incidents, and identify infected hosts.

| where DeviceVendor == "Check Point"
| where DeviceProduct in ({DeviceProducts}) or '{DeviceProducts:label}' ==  "All";
data
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceProduct
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(DeviceProduct:string)['OneDrive', 'SharePoint']) on DeviceProduct
| project DeviceProduct = iff(DeviceProduct == '', DeviceProduct1, DeviceProduct), Count = iff(DeviceProduct == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DeviceProduct)
    on DeviceProduct
| project-away DeviceProduct1, TimeGenerated
| extend DeviceProduct = DeviceProduct
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend DeviceProduct = 'All', DeviceProducts = '*'    
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10

| summarize Amount = count() by SourceIP","size":0,"exportToExcelOptions":"visible","title":"Infected hosts","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"SourceIP","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Amount","formatter":20,"formatOptions":{"palette":"gray","showIcon":true}}],"filter":true}},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 6"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Check Point"
| where DeviceProduct in ({DeviceProducts}) or '{DeviceProducts:label}' ==  "All"
| where LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity}) or '{LogSeverity:label}' ==  "All"
| project origin = extract("origin=([^;]+)",1,AdditionalExtensions), loguid = extract("loguid=([^;]+)",1,AdditionalExtensions)
| summarize Logins = dcount(loguid), Count = count() by Origin = origin
| order by Logins, Count","size":0,"exportToExcelOptions":"visible","title":"Gateways and Servers","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Origin","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Logins","formatter":4,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"blue","showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":4,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"orange","showIcon":true}}]}},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 7"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let data = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Check Point"
| where DeviceProduct in ({DeviceProducts}) or '{DeviceProducts:label}' ==  "All"
| where LogSeverity in ({LogSeverity}) or '{LogSeverity:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceProduct in~ ("Anti-Bot", "Anti-Virus", "DDoS Protector", "IPS", "Threat Emulation") and FlexNumber1 in (3,4,5) and LogSeverity in~ ("Medium", "High", "Very-High") and DeviceAction in~ ("Detect","Prevent");
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by DeviceAction
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DeviceAction
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DeviceAction
| order by TotalCount desc, DeviceAction asc
| project DeviceAction, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by DeviceProduct , DeviceAction
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DeviceAction, DeviceProduct, LogSeverity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DeviceAction, DeviceProduct
| order by TotalCount desc, DeviceAction asc
| project DeviceAction, DeviceProduct, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on DeviceAction
| project Id, Name = DeviceProduct, Type = 'DeviceProduct', ['DeviceProduct Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = DeviceAction, Type = 'DeviceAction', ['DeviceProduct Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['DeviceProduct Count'] desc, Name asc

| order by Count","size":0,"exportToExcelOptions":"visible","title":"Log severity detailed","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"$gen_group","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"thresholdsOptions":"icons","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"High","representation":"error","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Medium","representation":"2","text":"{0}{1}"},{"thresholdValue":"Critical","representation":"critical","text":"{0}{1}"},{"operator":"Default","representation":"1","text":"{0}{1}"}]}},{"columnMatch":"LogSeverity","formatter":5,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"Message","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"aggregation":"Unique"}},{"columnMatch":"DeviceProduct","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"aggregation":"Unique"}},{"columnMatch":"SourceIP","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true,"aggregation":"Unique"}},{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"purpleBlue","showIcon":true,"aggregation":"Sum"}},{"columnMatch":"TimeGenerated","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"DeviceAction","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"showIcon":true}}],"rowLimit":1000,"filter":true,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["LogSeverity"],"expandTopLevel":false}}},"name":"query - 10"}],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-CheckPoint","$schema":"https://github.com/Microsoft/Application-Insights-Workbooks/blob/master/schema/workbook.json"}
